short_summary: Provision of Privacy Policy Analyst and Access to Information Act and/or Privacy Act Analysts.
description: The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PWGSC) needs to establish up to 1 contract for Workstream 1, and up to 2 contracts for Workstream 2.
full_summary:
### Solicitation for Privacy Policy Analyst and ATIP Analyst

#### Solicitation Details

* **Contract Title**: ATIP Analyst and Privacy Policy Analyst
* **Reference Number**: WS4015075511
* **Solicitation Method**: Competitive Selective Tendering
* **Publication Date**: June 1st, 2023
* **Closing Date**: August 2nd, 2023, 14:00 EDT
* **Procurement Category**: Service

#### Requirements

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) is seeking to establish up to 1 contract for Workstream 1, and up to 2 contracts for Workstream 2, for the provision of Privacy Policy Analyst and Access to Information Act and/or Privacy Act Analysts.

#### Contract Terms

* The contracts will be established for a period of 2 years, with 3 one-year irrevocable options to extend the term.
* The contracts will be “as and when requested” as defined in the Annex A1 – Workstream 1 Statement of Work or Annex A2 – Workstream 2 – Access to Information Act Analyst and/or Privacy Act Analyst for Public Works and Government Services ATIP Division.

#### Selection Criteria

* Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

#### Attachments

Please follow the solicitation notice in SAP Ariba: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16446956

**AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME**: Please note that the normal closing time of 14:00 HAE does not apply. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted on August 2nd, 2023, by 14:00 EDT. Any bids submitted after this time will be considered non-responsive.

#### Contact Information

* Contact Name: Natalie Bastianello-Lamoureux
* Contact Email: [natalie.bastianello-lamoureux@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:natalie.bastianello-lamoureux@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Contact Phone: Not specified

#### Notice URLs

* English: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16446956
* French: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16446956

#### Trade Agreements

This solicitation is covered by the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade
